name: Salinayan - 2017
description:
A 3D educational mobile and PC game created for a commissioned project. Before starting the game, the player must choose which foundation he/she should help. The foundation you picked will be funded and improved over the level progress. The aim of the game is to teach the player on how you can represent words into numbers or vice versa. Each correct answer will grant the player some money and it can be use to buy new avatar for the player. 

Disclaimer: This is for demo purpose only.
